channel.title: Cases
channel.description:
[code] case 2472: // modportal[/code]
OK on this case a certain portal is linked to it to teleport to a certain area. When coding cases do they have to be a certain number to be connected with the certain portal?

item.title: Cases
item.dc:creator: @dogzound5 dogzound5@gmail.com
item.description:
@dogzound5 wrote:

That is what I’ll do then.

Read full topic

item.title: Cases
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Anything is possible, but I have no idea about that. You can just clean out your emote commands and your customCommand method and add teleports via the magic interface too.

Read full topic

item.title: Cases
item.dc:creator: @dogzound5 dogzound5@gmail.com
item.description:
@dogzound5 wrote:

OK. Thanks Chassy. I had a question Chassy. Just say I wanted to remove all my custom commands from my emotes and from the commands list “::” and wanted to add an extra box on the top of my game window in the client and then add all teleports in there. Could that be done?

All teleports in a little window in game that could be clicked on.

Read full topic

item.title: Cases
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

dogzound5@gmail.com:

How many portal Id’s are there?

Check an object list. One can be found on the MoparScape 3.2 Aryan client.

Read full topic
